contexts.context: The level of a title is sometimes <mark>implied</mark> by its context: for example, a title...
...contexts, its value should not contradict the value <mark>implied</mark> by its parent element.
...the normal orientation of the parent surface element as <mark>implied</mark> by the dimensions given in the msDesc element or...
...all NB elements are written by Forbes (i.e. the <mark>implied</mark> value of resp is prs:FORBR1).
